subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: In two radio interviews, Seattle General Manager John Schneider said running back Marshawn Lynch, 29, was “leaning toward retirement” after an injury-plagued 2015 season.
snippet: In two radio interviews, Seattle General Manager John Schneider said running back Marshawn Lynch, 29, was “leaning toward retirement” after an injury-plagued 2015 season.
